message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair offer that lets us both benefit from settling this quickly.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. We both get a good portion of the money, and we can avoid the risk of losing more in the next rounds due to inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic. We both lose with every round. I'll meet you in the middle - 55/45 is my final offer.
